Reviews.Title: What a kit!
Reviews.Author: William H. Medina
Reviews.Content: One of the best top quality cameras. The kit comes with many useful gadgets which bought separatedly can be at least 200 dollars more expensive. I am very pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: Very good package.  The best camera on the market for this price range.  Takes a while to learn all the features but well worth it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon D7100 DSLR Camera with 18-105mm f/3.5-5.6G ED VR DX Lens + Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR Zoom Lens
2 High Definition UV Filters + Wireless Remote
32GB Memory Card + High Speed Memory Card Reader + Extended Life Replacement Battery
Full Size Tripod + Monopod + Deluxe Backpack
Table Top Tripod + LCD Screen Protectors + Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7100 DSLR Camera Kit with 18-105mm f/3.5-5.6G VR & 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G VR Lenses. Includes: 2 High Definition UV Filters, 32GB Memory Card, High Speed Card Reader, Extended Life Replacement Batteries, Full Size Tripod, Monopod, Deluxe Backpack & More
